hero.titulo: We transform any event into a unique experience through music.
hero.subtitulo: From elegant weddings to vibrant corporate parties, our professional DJ team ensures unforgettable moments.

quienesSomosTexto:
With over 10 years of experience, we know how to tailor every detail to your needs.
We craft unique environments with custom music, lighting, and atmosphere.
Whether it’s a wedding, birthday, corporate event or private party — our mission is to make it unforgettable.

servicios.title: Weddings
servicios.description: More than just music — we create the soundtrack of your love. A personalized audio-visual experience to make every moment unforgettable.
servicios.extendedText:
Our wedding service includes:

• Pre-event music planning (song selection for each moment)
• Professional sound system adapted to the venue
• Ambient lighting and special effects
• Coordination with the event schedule
• Option for live music or custom DJ sessions

Let us handle the vibe while you enjoy your perfect day.

servicios.title: Birthdays
servicios.description: The party you imagine, brought to life. From kids to adults — we create the right vibe with perfect music and visual energy.
servicios.extendedText:
Our birthday services include:

• Live DJ with customized playlist
• Lights, smoke effects, and visuals
• Games and crowd interaction if requested
• Karaoke option
• Sound tailored to indoor or outdoor spaces

We make sure no one wants the party to end.

servicios.title: Corporate Events
servicios.description: Professionalism and style to elevate your brand. We tailor music and lighting to match the event type and tone.
servicios.extendedText:
Corporate events include:

• Background music or DJ as needed
• Professional sound for speeches and presentations
• Brand-colored lighting or ambient visuals
• Wireless microphones and technical assistance
• Experience in expos, launches, conventions, and gala dinners

Let your company be remembered — for all the right reasons.

paquetes.descripcion: Ideal for intimate gatherings and smaller events. Includes a personalized playlist and fast setup to keep the music flowing.
Perfect for medium-sized celebrations. Features a lit DJ booth, wireless microphone and complete support throughout the event.
Our most complete experience for large events. Stage setup, live DJ performance and special effects tailored to your night.

reseñas.texto: Unforgettable music and energy! Thank you for making our night special.
The DJ was incredible — everyone danced all night long!
